rooms.name: Entrance Lobby
rooms.description: North-facing entrance area with wide door for wheelchair access and Vastu-compliant entry placement.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open-plan living area integrated with kitchen. Features a central seating area. Brick and concrete exposed finishes for Brutalist style.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room, designed as an open-plan space with functional counter spaces, ample storage, and wheelchair accessible layout.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with en-suite bathroom. Designed for easy mobility and clear pathways.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Large bedroom suitable for additional family member or guest room. Accessible design considerations included.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Additional bedroom ensuring ample space while maintaining the Brutalist aesthetic.

rooms.name: Bathroom 1
rooms.description: En-suite bathroom for Master Bedroom with grab bars and accessible design.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Wheelchair accessible guest bathroom located near the living area.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: Quiet study space with ample shelving and adjustable lighting. Positioned to receive natural light from a north-facing window while respecting Vastu guidelines.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: Wheelchair accessible entry with minimal steps and reinforced concrete finish.

openings.name: Living Area Windows
openings.description: Large windows providing ample natural light while maintaining the raw, Brutalist aesthetic.

openings.name: Rooftop Terrace Access
openings.description: Access to a rooftop terrace designed with wheelchair ramps and safety features.

additional_features.name: Rooftop Terrace
additional_features.description: A flat area atop the structure offering outdoor space. Incorporates sustainable elements such as rainwater harvesting and solar panels, aligned with local environmental guidelines.

additional_features.name: Wheelchair Accessible Ramps
additional_features.description: Additional ramps integrated throughout the house for accessibility between levels and rooms.

vastu_considerations.details: North-facing entrance enhances positive energy flow as per Vastu principles, with proper alignment of living spaces.
Open plan layout in the living and kitchen areas supports free circulation of air and light, promoting harmony.

brutalist_elements.description: Raw concrete surfaces used throughout interior spaces, reflecting the Brutalist style.
Use of robust materials and minimalist finishes create a stark yet functional aesthetic.
